fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
Each night, select two players to infect them with a disease.
Attributes: They will both be given a disease stage of 0. If they are already infected, their disease stage will increase by 1.
At the end of each night, players with a disease will have their disease stage increased by 1.
Players who reach disease stage 3 will be dealt a Powerful Attack.
Players with a disease will have their disease stage reset if they are healed.
If you die, all diseases will be removed.
